data.description: Hi! I'm Maria. I'm based in Somerset. My background is in social pedagogy, mediation, and childcare. I started coding as a hobby, and nowadays, I am turning it into my career. ðŸ˜Š

Hello everyone. My name is Martina, I live in London, I am a former nurse and psychotherapist who discovered a passion for coding and decided to translate her problem-solving skills into tech as a developer.
